name: ROBOTS (itch)
description:
Game based on the original idea of a tic-tac-toe game about robots by At0mium (a french streamer that recently played mad games tycoon).

Art assets are free ones from opengameart :

  • Hero robot: by pzUH
  • Giant robot background: by madmarcel
  • Music: by Macro

Source files can be found on github.
